text: Display now is a digital signage solution.
that allows you to communicate visually by
turning any screen into a sign.
It has broad applications across education,
healthcare, fitness, restaurants and beyond.
I'm Chris Duke package and I created
Display Now originally to help communicate with
building residents in a condo building.
We found that people just weren't checking their email,
and we needed a way to get the word
out for certain events, updates, projects and more.
We tried a free solution, but we ended up spending
more time per month maintaining it than it was worth,
and other solutions were too complicated and costly.
So Display Now was born, and I partnered with
successive technologies to help make that a reality.
And they've been a wonderful partner for the past
couple of years, and I'm grateful for that.
They were able to take mock ups, take a
concept and turn that into designs, and then iteratively
build that out into a solution, and it's been
awesome to work with them throughout the whole process.
Now, when a school needs to get the word out
about a science, there they can do so quickly and
easily just with just a few taps on any device.
And so I'm very grateful for the success of
Technologies team, for being such a wonderful partner, and
I'm excited to see what we do next.
